original_title: This Is the End: A Meditation on Justice & Humanity, Life & Death, and Bagels
overview: Hugh Mann was already not having a good day, so another encounter with Justice McBain was the last thing he needed. This chance encounter with his nemesis raises the stakes in their relationship. Would anything less than a matter of life and death be fitting for a meeting between these two titans?
tagline: Just when you thought it was safe to go in the bagel storeâ€¦
title: This Is the End: A Meditation on Justice & Humanity, Life & Death, and Bagels
